p: In Figure 1 we show Feira de Santana municipality and the highways network that converge from all Brazilian regions in that place. We believe this is of particular importance for the dissemination of infectious diseases within the country, as the intense movement of people there, may contribute to virus dispersion to other locations. We added information about location on the map when it shows Brazil and the zoom that is showing Feira de Santana, highlighting the road junction.
